entry.key: Log level when file not found

entry.value:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS covid.consolidada_2021;
create table covid.consolidada_2021 as select covid_casos.date, covid_casos.state, coalesce(covid_casos.city,'') as city, covid_casos.place_type, covid_casos.confirmed, covid_casos.deaths, covid_casos.is_last, covid_casos.estimated_population_2019, covid_casos.city_ibge_code, covid_casos.confirmed_per_100k_inhabitants, covid_casos.death_rate, municipios.latitude, municipios.longitude from covid.covid_casos inner join covid.municipios on covid_casos.city_ibge_code = municipios.codigo_ibge where TO_DATE(covid_casos.date, 'YYYY/MM/DD') > '2020-12-31' and TO_DATE(covid_casos.date,'YYYY/MM/DD') < '2021-12-31';
